page.description: Pseduo-function used to apply the order for a Grid Component to a Report.

discussion.p: The *[xb:currentGridOrder()]* function is a pseudo-function that can be used to apply the current order in a Grid Component to a Report.
To apply a Grid's filter expression to a report, use the [currentGridFilter()] pseudo-function.
